titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a capital gain exclusion for investments in qualified businesses with employee stock ownership programs within Federal enterprise zones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 4/29/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income 100 percent of qualified capital gain recognized on the sale or exchange of a qualified zone asset held for more than five years. Describes such assets as enterprise zone stock, business property, and partnership interests.
